list.EMPTY: There are no PXE installations running right now
list.TITLE: OS Reloads

progress.RELOADING: This server's operating system is being reloaded.

confirm.TITLE: Stop Tracking Operating System Reload?
confirm.BODY: This will stop tracking the installation, but will not stop it from continuing.

server.TITLE: Operating System Reload

server.NO_PXE_ACCESS: You do not have access to Operating System Reloads on this server.

confirm.CONFIRM: I understand that this will delete all data on the disk.

password.LABEL: Root Password
password.HELP: This password will not be saved! Please copy it somewhere safe.
